result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Zacarias Hernandez Diaz

records.addlTxt: Adjoining States. Signed by EFV on 10/7/22. c: SCSO w/ complaint; ec: Attys. kma

3:23 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court for Zacarias Hernandez Diaz. Defendant Zacarias Hernandez Diaz not in court. INCLUDES 21CT277, 21TR3716, 22CF288, 22CF464, 22TR1226 and 22TR1227. Atty. Perrin is unaware of DE's whereabouts. State requests warrant and notes DE's absconder status. Court issues WARRANT - body only, adjoining states. State requests default on TR cases. Court defaults TR matters and orders: 21TR3716: Fine $263.50. 22TR1226: Fine $263.50. 22TR1227: Fine $175.30. Adjourned: 3:28 PM. kma

Status conference on August 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

7:46 AM CO: Vlack appeared by phone, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson.  Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin appeared by video for Zacarias Hernandez Diaz. Defendant Zacarias Hernandez Diaz in court. Monica Marin appeared by video. Includes 21CT277, 21TR3716, 22CF288, 22CF464, 22TR1226, 22TR1227. Court reviews case. Sworn interpreter. Court notes DE has posted bond. Attys to schedule with Clerk. Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Per EFV. arc   fax: Dispatch, Sheriff, Jail

-  Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

- Complete an AODA Assessment.

- I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required be fitted with a SCRAM alcohol testing unit and further understand I am to submit to random alcohol testing at least 5 times per day (12AM, 6AM, 12PM, 2:30PM, and 9PM). Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. 

If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.
Bail/bond hearing on July 19, 2022 at 08:45 am.

11:50 AM Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Shirlene Renee Perrin in court for Zacarias Hernandez Diaz. Defendant Zacarias Hernandez Diaz in court. Monica Marin Interpreter in court. Includes 21CT277, 21TR3716, 22CF288, 22TR1226, 22TR1227, PTC and 22CF464 IN/RW. Court reviews case. Sworn Interpreter. 22CF464: Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant doesn't qualify for PD. Court to sign OACL appointing Atty Perrin. Bond argument. Recess 12:09 PM. Back on Record 12:15 PM. Same appearances. Bond argument continues. Court orders bond. Court quashes warrant. Court sets BBH in 22CF464 and STC in all other matters. 21CF288 to be set for JT with JA. Adjourned 12:27 PM
